document_data.name: ''Potion of Endurance''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potion of endurance''''' were magic concoctions that increased the drinker's stamina.
document_data.Powers: ''Potion of endurance'' could be created with a variety of different recipes but all of them had the same effect when consumed. The [[potion]] enhanced the imbiber's stamina and overall health but it possessed no healing magic.
document_data.History:
''Potion of endurance'' were widely available for purchase from traders and [[wizard]]s of the [[Sword Coast]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

''Circa'' [[1373 DR]], ''potions of endurance'' were a part [[Zhentil Keep]] garrison's standard equipment and could be found in the satchels of simple guardsmen, cavalry, and skymages. During the same period of time ''potions of endurance'' could be found in the wizard stronghold of [[Telkoun's Tower]].
